author: Paul Miller
description: Google just announced that it will officially support Kotlin on Android as a “first-class” language. Kotlin is a super new programming language built by Jet Brains, which also coincidentally...
title: Google is adding Kotlin as an official programming language for Android development

author: Emil Protalinski
description: At its I/O 2017 developers conference today, Google announced Android is gaining official support for the Kotlin programming language, in addition to Java and C++. The news received the biggest applause from the audience so far. You can download the Kotlin plugin today for Android Studio.
title: Android now supports the Kotlin programming language

author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Google today announced that it is making Kotlin, a statically typed programming language for the Java Virtual Machine, a first-class language for writing..
title: Google makes Kotlin a first-class language for writing Android apps

author: Claire Rutter
description: Judi James, body language expert, has weighed in on that awkward interview.
title: Katy Perry's body language reveals everything about Russell Brand agony

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
Duolingo announced today that it was adding Japanese to its language courses.

The course teaches English-speaking users the hiragana syllabary in addition to Japanese phrases, with ...
title: Duolingo adds Japanese to its catalog of languages

author: Kim Rixecker
description: Neben Java wird zukünftig auch Kotlin offiziell als Android-Programmiersprache unterstützt. Dazu wird sie auch direkt – ohne Umweg über ein Plugin – in Android Studio integriert.
title: Alternative zu Java: Android unterstützt jetzt offiziell Kotlin

description: A South Korean government minister says North Korea's missile program is progressing faster than expected.
title: North Korea missile program progressing faster than expected: Seoul

author: Scott McCartney
description: Southwest and JetBlue outperform larger U.S. and foreign competitors with more generous programs, while American lags behind again, Scott McCartney finds.
title: The Best (and Worst) Frequent-Flier Programs for Free Seats for 2017

author: Helen Davidson
description: Social value derived from programs far outweighs funding put in but experts warn there are still huge gaps in resourcing
title: 'Little island of hope': NT youth programs worth every cent, report finds

author: Reuters Editorial
description: The United States on Wednesday sanctioned two Iranian defense officials, an Iranian company and members of a China-based network for supporting Iran's ballistic missile program, the U.S. Treasury said in a statement.
title: U.S. sanctions Iran officials, Chinese network over missile program
